    mov r0.x, v6.w
    mov r0.y, v7.w
    mov r0.z, v8.w
    add r0.xyz, r0, c9
    dp3 r0.x, r0, r0
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, r0.x

    add o0.w, -r0.x, c11.x
    mul r0.xy, c12.z, v5.zwzw
    frc r0.zw, r0.xyxy
    add r1.xy, r0, -r0.zwzw
    slt r0.zw, -r0, r0
    slt r0.xy, r0, -r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, r0.zwzw, r1
    mad r1.xy, r0, -c13.x, v5.zwzw
    mul o3.xz, r1.xyyw, c12.w
    mad r1.xyz, v1.yzxw, c11.y, c11.z

    mul r3.xyz, r1, r2.zxyw
    mad r1.xyz, r2.yzxw, r1.yzxw, -r3

    mul r3.xyz, r2.yzxw, r1.zxyw
    mad r3.xyz, r1.yzxw, r2.zxyw, -r3

    mov r1.w, c6.w
    mad r0.w, r1.w, r0.w, c7.x
    add r0.w, r0.w, c11.w
    frc r0.w, r0.w
    mad r0.w, r0.w, c12.x, c12.y

    mul r5.xzw, c6.xyyz, v3.xyyz
    mad r4.xyz, r5.y, r5.xzww, r4

    mov o0.xyz, v3

    mov o1.xy, r0.zxzw
    mul r0.x, r0.y, c12.w
    mul o3.yw, r0.x, c13.xyzz
    mul o2, c13.yyzz, v4.xyxx
    mul r0, r4.y, c1
    mad r0, c0, r4.x, r0
    mad r0, c2, r4.z, r0
    mad r0, c3, r4.w, r0

    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c8, r0
